documents.document: @mzk90 @clivepafc which is why England lose to Iceland. I'd like to know if possession=less yards.
@mzk90 @clivepafc just over crap statistics which have no context whatsoever knowing muppets will read it and want more 'heart'.
@clivepafc hazard goal prime ex. LeCoq flick then commits forward. Simple pass broke uncommitted press and hazard away. No cohesion.
@mzk90 any time a significant upgrade becomes available and you can afford it, it should be taken. I love LeCoq but opportunity missed.
@mzk90 @clivepafc Typical British bulldog spirit bullshit. Not playing well? Can't be running far enough or hard enough. Outdated.
@ArdChoilleNZ yep done that a few times this year
@ArdChoilleNZ Nah we got home an hour ago. Ella is coming from Palmy though so will be in it.
@mickwinnett Janmat through Ozil from behind walks away. Yet Sanchez booked for complaining of time wasting.
@ArdChoilleNZ I count today as 6/7th time SH1 has been closed around us since Oct. Shocking driving this year, like I've not seen before.
@ArdChoilleNZ @NZTAWgtn I'm coming home. 60 minuted from Paekok to Otaihunga
@mzk90 Yes, crazy world where the desire for statistics is overriding their actual worth. Hard to teach kids on what is meaningful now.
@mzk90 Same way I assume a GK taking a goal kick is a pass. How else did Heaton have highest passes for Burnley ? Mad.
@btsportfootball @eintracht_eng @mzk90 #Bundesliga content not available in your country. How useless is that ?
Is Glen Moss incapable of passing the ball any shorter than 60 yards? I've always envied how Roar play from the back. #WELvBRI

TWY doing everything they can to not win this. plenty of chances but quality in final third lacking. rain and wind not helping. #NYL #TWYvTU

@scottjpalmer Pffffft, NEVER had a bank refuse to lend me money. Don't see this any different.
Get. In. #otakibeach #beachlife #summerishere https://t.co/2dJQDhU45e
@melmelis fewer shocks but some still over 6mag ! Slips and lots of flooding from heavy rain caused chaos. Both roads into WLG closed yday
@melmelis yeah we're all good, just a little seasick :) don't let it put you guys off coming next year.
@melmelis yes mate, three huge ones up here a couple of hours ago. Shocks are pretty much every five minutes all around the country.
I love watching at these. Last 48 hours of earthquakes in NZ. https://t.co/BNHrkgTi2b
Faaaaaark, now that's an earthquake ! Over a minute and the house all over the place.
@cosmo_nz #firstworldproblems I have three 24' monitors and still struggle sometimes.
I've had worse views from hotels. @ RACV Cape Schanck Resort https://t.co/XPGw9FPeAa
2.47am is no time to be awake. But Melbourne here we come !
@clivepafc Ruthless and fast. Anytime we broke the midfield line ;) we didn't go for goal fast enough. Allowing them to recover.
@clivepafc Agreed. But it's not football. Just hoofing it away in the first ten minutes. Our defensive mistakes gave them hope.
@clivepafc Boro today were awful. 4 very narrow at the back and another five no more than 10 yards in front. There is just no space at all.
@clivepafc No banks of 4 and 5 in our day Clive. Proper 443 with L and R midfield and wingers. 1v1 challenges all over park and no lines.
Saturday afternoon, back garden love. #summerishere #sunshine… https://t.co/LKXAy2H2s8
@mzk90 #FeetOnGround Maybe just one foot off the ground ?
P4 W4 yesterday. GF20 GA1 (a penalty) and it was boring. First game this morning the best 0-0 you will ever see. Football at its best.
@mzk90 Haha, was a very respective 7.45am ko this morning !
Knee rehab week 12: One legged cycling. I'd forgotten how hard that is when your hammy has withered away to nothing.
@metlinkwgtn No problem. It turned up around 8.30 but I know lots of people use the 290 for school and work.
@metlinkwgtn Our 7.45am 290 bus hadn't arrived by 8.20. So your "up to 20 minutes" is a little optimistic :)
@Yakcall @NZTAWgtn People must think the roadworks have slowed them down and they need to catch up.
@Yakcall @NZTAWgtn Yep, we drive Otaki to Porirua 4/5 times a week. See near misses at high speed every week....
@Yakcall @NZTAWgtn Lots of people are doing crazy things around these roadworks. We've seen several near misses. Only a matter of time.
@NZTAWgtn We need to get from Otaki to Kapiti College. We've been in these diversions before and it's taken hours to get through.
@Yakcall @NZTAWgtn that's what we expected. Peak traffic and the roadworks mean it will be horrendous. Looks like they will have the day off
@NZTAWgtn #SH1 Why 12pm ? Just wondering how to get the kids to school !
@Dale_Warburton not a great intro to exams though. She was worried enough as it was !
@Dale_Warburton having seen the exam now I'm worried she may not have understood too much. Proof will be in the mark....
@Dale_Warburton Haha, I worked for 4 weeks with my girl who has always struggled with maths. She said it was easier than expected but....

Lhutt clearly had a plan and have executed it. Not pretty and not touched ball 2nd hf but it looks like they will take the points. #mcl16
If there isn't 15 minutes added for LHutt time wasting the ref needs a talking too. #mcl16
85' battery dying. It's been all Wests but just too many yellow shirts. Counted 7 across their 18yd box just now. #mcl16
80' Wests player leaves his foot in and it's high too. Deserved yellow. #mcl16
72' Wests player thru on goal and taken from behind by last man. Ref gives a free kick only infuriating the Wests bench. #mcl16
70' 9, yes nine, LHutt players in their 6 yard box for a Wests corner. #takingnochances #mcl16
Not sure what will happen first. A West's goal or LHutt red. They are flying into everything and taking players out off the ball #mcl16
